headline: 3 Good Things About BlackBerry Q3 Earnings (Rating Upgrade)
summary: BlackBerry stock surged on profitable Q3 results & IoT growth. The sale of BlackBerry Cylance will strengthen the balance sheet. See why BB is a speculative buy.
